name: What Animated Women Want
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), J. Stewart Burns, Jon Kern (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Once more Homer's selfishness has antagonized Marge and his attempts to make things up with her consistently fail - until he resorts to buying sex toys, one of which injures him. They fail to impress her but she is pleased that he made the effort. Meanwhile, having watched 'A Streetcar Named Desire' Milhouse decides that the best way to court Lisa is to treat her mean though the fa√ßade eventually crumbles.
